LDAP_URL.description: URL and port of the LDAP server used for authentication

BASE_DN_LIST.description: Colon separated list of Base DNs

SEARCH_FILTER.description: LDAP filter used to find the user

PARAMETER_DEFAULTS_APPLICATION.description: A comma separated list of one or more users/applications, who are provided with 'parameter_defaults' instead of 'parameters' when using the API to get documents (ENM, ManagedConfig & VNF-LCM) in json.

JIRA_HOST.description: The JIRA host to allow access to JIRA Issues, through the API or for linking on UI.

JIRA_USERNAME.description: The username to allow access to JIRA Issues through the API.

JIRA_PASSWORD.description: The password to allow access to JIRA Issues through the API.

DIT_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: DIT's email address is used for sender parameter.

DTT_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: DTT's email address is to give DIT access to send emails.

DTT_EMAIL_PASSWORD.description: DTT's password is needed to give DIT access to ERICSSON Tools and send emails.

TEAM_EMAIL.description: Team email address is used for recipient parameter.
